channel.title: Very new project(grand opening soon)
channel.description:
Hi all im working on a very new project .. this will be my very first server... so dont flame me lol..
The server is gona get called Devil Island
Ill show the updates i did on it (its based on pimp)
Update 81 info: Added 98% specs(havent tested yet) Update 80 info: Added dialogue handler Update 79 info: Added duel arena! Update 78 info: Fixed projectiles, and added all strike, bolt, blast and wave spells Update 77 info: Make over mage and smithing fixed Update 76 info: You now walk to object before doing action like real rs Update 75 info: FULL woodcutting, works great, also a few bug fixes Update 74 info: Teleother Update 73 info: You keep your 3 most valuable items when you die! Update 72 info: Added a limit to npcs you can summon and also made it so all your summoned npcs die when you logout Update 71 info: Added SUMMONING skill Update 70 info: Added support for poisoning npcs and now ice barrage hits multiple targets! Update 69 info: Added Spells Of The Gods quest! Tested and fully working! Update 68 info: Fixed cooking up so you have a chance of burning depends on level and gaunlets Update 67 info: Added Hidden points, you get points for doing secret commands etc :D Update 66 info: Made timers 5x as fast on skills, magic xp has doubled and added backup save feature Update 65 info: Added pk points, kill and death counts. Update 64 info: Added full range, deletes arrow from equipment slot and arrow appears on floor, has proper bonuses too :D Update 63 info: Wilderness levels Update 62 info: Instead of blood runes there is ecto tokens, this stops server from crashing Update 61 info: Added teleblock! Update 60 info: Added GLOBAL GRAPHICS!!!! Update 59 info: Added Chaos Elemental which can remove your item when your attacks (random though) Update 58 info: Added weather, changes from morning to afternoon, from afternoon to evening etc. depending on the time, also randomly changes weather every 20 mins from either snow, sandstorm or normal. Update 57 info: Friends/Ignore list fully working, saves as well. Update 56 info: Cook's Assistant Quest fully working! Update 55 info: Bones To Bananas Spell Update 54 info: Invisible Armour Quest fully working! Update 53 info: Added working clues Update 52 info: Added Dr Jad Update 51 info: Added 362 items and map support Update 50 info: Added spells requiring runes Update 49 info: Converted from mythscape base to whitescape base Update 48 info: Added ancient magicks with working spells on players Update 47 info: Added server status Update 46 info: Added new dungeon with kbd Update 45 info: Added global items Update 44 info: Added timed attacking and new weapons Update 43 info: Added logout timers Update 42 info: Added herblore stall Update 41 info: Added fletching skill Update 40 info: Added smithing and herblore Update 39 info: Added ranged pking Update 38 info: Added abyssal demons with drops Update 37 info: Added orb of light Update 36 info: Added openable doors Update 35 info: Added enchanting and high alching Update 34 info: Added proper trading and energy Update 33 info: Added more doors, bank chests and disabled wildy teleporting Update 32 info: Added prayer training area Update 31 info: Added weapon timers Update 30 info: Added proper pking so items is dropped and dupe bug is now fixed Update 29 info: Added equipment requirements Update 28 info: Added god capes (changed area) and working mage bank lever Update 27 info: Fixed hp bug Update 26 info: Added strength bonuses Update 25 info: Added losing items when dying (don't drop on floor though) Update 24 info: Added abyss Update 23 info: Fixed crashing client bug on ancient gate, and took out scythes Update 22 info: Added very basic trading (use item on player to give item) Update 21 info: Added god capes Update 20 info: Added new death place and updatestats feature Update 19 info: Made training faster(hmm sitll taking a while to lvl lol) Update 18 info: Added 3 new slayer objects Update 17 info: Added restore command to fix broken stats Update 16 info: Changed max skill level to 99 Update 15 info: Added more items Update 14 info: Added legends cape Update 13 info: Added runecraft skill Update 12 info: Fixed dupe bug Update 11 info: Party hat spawning bug fixed and removed from game Update 10 info: Added working clues Update 9 info: Added stat viewer Update 8 info: Added 3 more menus Update 7 info: Fixed level requirement bug Update 6 info: Fixed keep on dying bug Update 5 info: Hp back to full after dying Update 4 info: Added god staves Update 3 info: Added new theiving area Update 2 info: Added first ever quest Update 1 info: Fixed minor message bug and added silver stalls
No pics yet soz for this
ill post pics later;)
hope to see you when the grand opening is..

item.title: Very new project(grand opening soon)
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Hi all im working on a very new project … this will be my very first server…
so dont flame me lol…

The server is gona get called Devil Island

Ill show the updates i did on it (its based on pimp)

Update 81 info: Added 98% specs(havent tested yet)
Update 80 info: Added dialogue handler
Update 79 info: Added duel arena!
Update 78 info: Fixed projectiles, and added all strike, bolt, blast and wave spells
Update 77 info: Make over mage and smithing fixed
Update 76 info: You now walk to object before doing action like real rs
Update 75 info: FULL woodcutting, works great, also a few bug fixes
Update 74 info: Teleother
Update 73 info: You keep your 3 most valuable items when you die!
Update 72 info: Added a limit to npcs you can summon and also made it so all your summoned npcs die when you logout
Update 71 info: Added SUMMONING skill
Update 70 info: Added support for poisoning npcs and now ice barrage hits multiple targets!
Update 69 info: Added Spells Of The Gods quest! Tested and fully working!
Update 68 info: Fixed cooking up so you have a chance of burning depends on level and gaunlets
Update 67 info: Added Hidden points, you get points for doing secret commands etc
Update 66 info: Made timers 5x as fast on skills, magic xp has doubled and added backup save feature
Update 65 info: Added pk points, kill and death counts.
Update 64 info: Added full range, deletes arrow from equipment slot and arrow appears on floor, has proper bonuses too
Update 63 info: Wilderness levels
Update 62 info: Instead of blood runes there is ecto tokens, this stops server from crashing
Update 61 info: Added teleblock!
Update 60 info: Added GLOBAL GRAPHICS!!!
Update 59 info: Added Chaos Elemental which can remove your item when your attacks (random though)
Update 58 info: Added weather, changes from morning to afternoon, from afternoon to evening etc. depending on the time, also randomly changes weather every 20 mins from either snow, sandstorm or normal.
Update 57 info: Friends/Ignore list fully working, saves as well.
Update 56 info: Cook’s Assistant Quest fully working!
Update 55 info: Bones To Bananas Spell
Update 54 info: Invisible Armour Quest fully working!
Update 53 info: Added working clues
Update 52 info: Added Dr Jad
Update 51 info: Added 362 items and map support
Update 50 info: Added spells requiring runes
Update 49 info: Converted from mythscape base to whitescape base
Update 48 info: Added ancient magicks with working spells on players
Update 47 info: Added server status
Update 46 info: Added new dungeon with kbd
Update 45 info: Added global items
Update 44 info: Added timed attacking and new weapons
Update 43 info: Added logout timers
Update 42 info: Added herblore stall
Update 41 info: Added fletching skill
Update 40 info: Added smithing and herblore
Update 39 info: Added ranged pking
Update 38 info: Added abyssal demons with drops
Update 37 info: Added orb of light
Update 36 info: Added openable doors
Update 35 info: Added enchanting and high alching
Update 34 info: Added proper trading and energy
Update 33 info: Added more doors, bank chests and disabled wildy teleporting
Update 32 info: Added prayer training area
Update 31 info: Added weapon timers
Update 30 info: Added proper pking so items is dropped and dupe bug is now fixed
Update 29 info: Added equipment requirements
Update 28 info: Added god capes (changed area) and working mage bank lever
Update 27 info: Fixed hp bug
Update 26 info: Added strength bonuses
Update 25 info: Added losing items when dying (don’t drop on floor though)
Update 24 info: Added abyss
Update 23 info: Fixed crashing client bug on ancient gate, and took out scythes
Update 22 info: Added very basic trading (use item on player to give item)
Update 21 info: Added god capes
Update 20 info: Added new death place and updatestats feature
Update 19 info: Made training faster(hmm sitll taking a while to lvl lol)
Update 18 info: Added 3 new slayer objects
Update 17 info: Added restore command to fix broken stats
Update 16 info: Changed max skill level to 99
Update 15 info: Added more items
Update 14 info: Added legends cape
Update 13 info: Added runecraft skill
Update 12 info: Fixed dupe bug
Update 11 info: Party hat spawning bug fixed and removed from game
Update 10 info: Added working clues
Update 9 info: Added stat viewer
Update 8 info: Added 3 more menus
Update 7 info: Fixed level requirement bug
Update 6 info: Fixed keep on dying bug
Update 5 info: Hp back to full after dying
Update 4 info: Added god staves
Update 3 info: Added new theiving area
Update 2 info: Added first ever quest
Update 1 info: Fixed minor message bug and added silver stalls

No pics yet soz for this

ill post pics later;)

hope to see you when the grand opening is…
